folder_management module¶

folder_management.find_folders(master_folder)¶

Search for folders inside the given address.

master_folderstring

address of the master folder on local computer.

AttributeError:

Raises error when no folder can be found.

measurementslist

list with the address of folders inside master_folder.

folder_management.manage_folders(index, measurement_folders)¶

Creates a folder structure to stores analysis and figures wrt a given measurement set. Measurement Folder ——> Analysis Folder

|—–> Figures Folder

indexinteger

Select the measurement folder to be analysed

measurements: list

contains all addresses of measurement folders

AttributeError:

Raises error when no folder can be found.

tuple with:
datapathpath

address of the measurement folder

folder_analysispath

address of the analysis folder

folder_figurespath

address of the figures folder

tespackage
